pages.text: $(l)Mining: A Gold Rush Adventure$() $(br2)Welcome to the exciting world of mining, where every swing of the pickaxe brings you closer to untold riches. But don't just dig aimlessly -- be smart and maximize your yield!
Legend has it that gold pickaxes possess Fortune II, making them perfect for striking it big. Grab one and start your own gold rush -- just remember, they're fragile, so don't be too heavy-handed.

$(l)The Golden Blacksmith's Gavel$() $(br2)Looking for more bang for your buck? Craft the gavel from Forbidden & Arcanus to boost your ore drops. It's like having your own personal leprechaun, minus the rainbows.
